title: Troubleshooting - Streaming App Login
description: A customer cannot log in to a partner streaming app (e.g., Netflix) that is included with their plan.

tasks.description: Verify the customer's plan includes the streaming service subscription.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the 'Unlimited Gold' plan includes a Netflix subscription.

tasks.description: Check the status of the subscription link between the telecom account and the partner service.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the subscription link is in a 'pending activation' state.

tasks.description: Manually re-trigger the activation link and instruct the customer to try logging in again in 5 minutes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully re-sends the activation signal.
